subject: Re: 12-469
author: Chad
full_text:
Deb,

You were right. The 469 validated EVPs that I have captured in my
apartment. the name given was the same as on the EVP when I asked who
was here.

You are a wealth of information. Thank you.
> ________________________________
> 
> From: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com [mailto:EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf
> Of Chad
> Sent: Monday, August 11, 2008 11:32 PM
> To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
> Subject: [EVP-ITC] 12-469
> 
> 
> 
> How do you guys have the 469 set up? I've hacked the radio, but do not
> have a port into my sound card. Any suggestions of different
> configurations that have worked well for you. I'm in Atlanta so we
> have a lot of stations and I'm getting what seems like a lot of one
> station or another when it scans. Do you find it necessary to mix the
> raw audio with white noise?
>
